text: Vincent Daniel Blondel is a computer engineer and current rector of the University of Louvain (UCLouvain) in Louvain-la-Neuve, Belgium. He was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for his contributions to computational analysis of systems and networks. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:21st-century Belgian engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Belgian computer scientists Category:Rectors of universities in Belgium Category:Université catholique de Louvain faculty
title: Vincent Daniel Blondel
